title: gender
description: The development and body fat composition of girls and boys vary with age. Consequently, a child's age and gender are considered when evaluating their BMI.

title: age
description: In aging individuals, increased body fat and muscle loss may cause BMI to underestimate body fat.

title: muscle
description: BMI may misclassify muscle builders as overweight or obese, as it doesn't differentiate between types of fat and muscle.

title: pregnancy
description: Expectant mothers experience weight gain due to the additional load of their growing child.

title: race
description: Certain health concerns may affect individuals of some Black and Asian origins at lower BMIs than others.
